__e: Samantha, you don't know how happy you've made me.
Samantha doesn't seem quite herself tonight, does she?
If this coat is so special, honey, well, why doesn't Samantha like it?
Samantha, you're a very sensible girl, but you've got too much imagination for your own good and too much champagne.
Samantha, you were here, and... let me see. Endora, you were nowhere.
Samantha, you don't know how happy you've made me.
Look, I'm not going anywhere until I know Samantha's safe!
I know what Samantha's trying to say.
I want to know where Samantha is!
It's your old playmate Samantha and I'm afraid it's not all that happy.
Oh, Samantha, I'm still a guest in your home, and happy surroundings make a happy guest.
I'd like to take Samantha and her husband out of town to attend a very special family function.
That's a very good question, Your Majesty. And Samantha is just the person to explain it.
I think Samantha is older than I am.
Samantha is what she is, and that you cannot change.
